info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 6:45PM PDT until August 31 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 745 PM PDT. * At 643 PM PDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located 7 miles southeast of Jean, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and hail up to dime size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect areas of blowing dust, possible tree damage, and downed power lines. * Locations impacted include... Jean and Primm. This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 1 and 25. Highway 95 in Clark County between mile markers 43 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
